title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight - SimBrief Panel - version 1.0.1
description:
In this video we will look at SimBrief Panel which is a new community addon which has been released a few days ago. The addon allows you to easily show the most important data from the flight plan without leaving MSFS. First we look at how to get the tool and install it and after that we will have a short look at this addon.

If you want to give the panel a try visit the link below to download it
https://flightsim.to/file/48336/simbrief-panel
